entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
